entry.title: Sunday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Becoming partly cloudy this evening. Fog patches developing near midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Sunday 12 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: A mix of sun and cloud. High plus 2.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 14 in the morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Sunday 12 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Light snow. Temperature steady near minus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Light snow beginning in the evening and ending overnight. Risk of freezing drizzle in the evening. Wind becoming west 20 km/h overnight. Temperature steady near minus 1. Wind chill minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Sunday 12 February 2023
